title: Z.Z. Hill - Down Home (1992) [FLAC]
description:
A legendary album, which stayed on the Billboard soul album chart for nearly two years. "Down Home Blues" is one of the best-known blues songs of the '80s.


Z.Z. Hill - Down Home
Label: Malaco Records - MALD-7406
Format: CD, Album, Reissue
Country: US
Released: 1992
Originally released 1982 
Genre: Blues, Soul, R&B


Tracklist:

1 	Down Home Blues 	5:10
2 	Cheatin' In The Next Room 	3:32
3 	Everybody Knows About My Good Thing 	4:53
4 	Love Me 	3:44
5 	That Means So Much To Me 	3:53
6 	When Can We Do This Again 	4:15
7 	Right Arm For Your Love 	3:28
8 	When It Rains It Pours 	3:37
9 	Woman Don't Go Astray 	2:20
10 	Givin' It Up For Your Love 	3:17


Personnel:

Z.Z. Hill - vocals
Dino Zimmerman, Leroy Emmanuel - guitar
Carson Whitsett - keyboards
Ray Griffin - bass
James Robertson - drums
The Muscle Shoals Horns
Jackson Strings
Charlotte Chenault, Jewel Bass, Thomasine Anderson - backing vocals
